122111221.content:
There were many perks to being a dragon and Haley Long, brother of the American Dragon, enjoyed every one of them. The wings were one of the good ones; after all, who wouldn't want to be able to fly? The strength, agility, and various other things weren't bad either. And the feeling of strength that came from being able to breathe fire could be addictive.

However, there were also cons to being a dragon.

For starters, that same fire breath could also cause bad breath, as her brother had found out. Then there was the skin shedding; Haley shuddered at the thought of going through that, especially since she had a reputation of taking care of her appearance. And then there was the gas.

That fire dragons could breath, while empowering, was also a nuisance from the gas inside every dragon that was used to produce it. Unfortunatly, when one didn't breath fire often, the gas would build up...and eventually have to be let out in the usual embaressing ways. Unlike her brother, who, while annoyed by it, didn't much seem to mind (what could you expect from boys), Haley considered it a killing embaressment. What was worse, since she didn't like letting it out, it would build up even more, leading to painful stomachaches. Well, no more of that.

"This should do it," said Haley, eyeing the vial of liquid in her hands, then taking a glance back at the book she had been studying. The book was open to gas prevention potions, and Haley found what she hoped was a good one. "Finally, no more embarresment," she said, tilting her head back and gulping the vial down, making a face at the taste. However, she soon felt it going to work, bubbling in her tummy. After a few minutes, the bubbling stopped. Haley no longer felt any pressure or discomfort and so assumed the potion had worked.

"Hah, beat that, Jake," she bragged, hopping down from the stool and fetching her backpack, still needing to get to school. As she left, she didn't notice the wind blow the page she had been reading over, revealing...

One morning, all of the campers were fast asleep. Then all of a sudden...

A giant explosion woke them up! "Hit the deck!" Duncan yelled as he jumped on the floor. "It's World War Three!" DJ screamed as he ran for cover. Meanwhile at the Gophers' cabin, the girls were screaming. "This is worse than that mall riot I went through!" Lindsay screamed as she hid under her bed. Then a familiar sound came after towards.

"Good morning, campers!" Chris said on a megaphone. "Oh, I am really starting to hate that loser!" Heather snarled as she got up. Gwen and LeShawna shook their heads in disgust. They'd rather listen to a barrage of Chris's explosions than to Heather's whiny mouth.

Getting dressed, the campers arrived tired and cranky. "Do you have any idea how crazy you are? Setting off explosions like that?" Courtney said. "I know. I've been waiting to do that since the last episode." Just for the record, this takes place after Beth was voted off.

"Today's little wake-up call was just to get you warmed up for today's challenge." Chris said. "So what is today's challenge? To make real explosions?" Duncan asked. "Cool. I've always wanted to blow something up." Harold said.

"You two are pretty close. Today's challenge is about doing something that requires bravery, craftsmanship and leadership." Chris said, "You're going to make...BALLOONS!!!" All of a sudden, a stream of fire-crackers and balloons popped out.

"Balloons?" Geoff asked, "You mean like party balloons?" "Why yes, Geoff. But first, you'll need leaders." Chris said. "I call being leader!" Heather yelled. "Me too!" Courtney screamed. "Perfect; now that we have two volunteers..." Chris ended his sentenced with a chuckle.

Then in a flash, Chef popped out and threw two hoses into Heather's and Courtney's mouths. They stayed to get them out, but the hoses' tips wrapped around their lower jaws. Everyone gasped. "Oh yeah. The first two who volunteer to be leaders will be the balloons." Chris said.

Courtney and Heather screamed. Gwen and LeShawna grinned at each other. Heather is going to be their balloon. "Whoever inflates their balloon the biggest without popping will be the winners." Chris said, "Here's your gas tanks. One person will be responsible for holding the balloon to the ground while the other will provide it will more tanks." LeShawna and Gwen volunteered. For them, this will be the ultimate payback. Duncan and DJ volunteered as well. "Hey; why can't I help?" Harold whined. "Because you've got the strength of an old lady, Harold." Duncan said. "I do not." he said. "He's got a point, dude." Geoff said. "Fine! I'll go over there!" Harold hollered. As he stormed off, he failed to notice that the boys left a fire-cracker in his pants. Snickering as he walked away, the boys laughed at what would happen next.

Then with a boom, Harold's pants were on fire. Screaming like a little girl, Harold ran for the lake. But by then, his pants were destroyed. "Idiots!" he said.

Back at the camp-grounds, Heather and Courtney were whimpering at the thought of popping to death. "Well, Heather. Today's your lucky day." Gwen said with a chillingly chuckle. "Yeah; we're going to give you a body to match that mouth of yours." LeShawna said.

Heather glared at them. "Constants! Ready, set..." Chris said. The suspense was growing between the two human-balloons. Duncan, Gwen and LeShawna couldn't wait to get started. "Go!" Chris yelled. Then with the sound of an air-horn, the two girl balloons were instantly inflated. Like real balloons, their bellies began to swell and inflate. Within ten seconds, their stomachs began to swell up to 5 inches around. Another 15 seconds later, their stomachs had swollen to basketball sizes. Courtney's shirt was ripped to pieces as her belly was 20 inches around.

Swallowing a foul-tasting gas, they wondered if this was what helium smelt like. "Oh by the way. That isn't helium you're being inflated with. It's Owen's own gas." Chris chuckled. Courtney and Heather had their eyes bug out. If they could vomit, they would. Being inflated with Owen's own flatulence gas, how could it get any worse?

As they inflated, their clothes were ripped to shreds as their whole bellies and chests became two spheres filled with Owen's gas. They already three feet around and began to float into the air. 13433212211.content:
(NOTE: This story would take place a while before the events in the actual game…)

Jessica Albert checked carefully behind herself to make sure she was not being followed, as she reached the tower door. Satisfied that she was indeed alone, she lifted up the door just enough to get through, and let it close quietly behind her. Her brother had already made his rounds for the evening, so he should not come back around again before dawn.

As she made her way up the tower, she looked at the old book she had found hidden in her family study. Jessica was pretty sure it was not “forbidden” magic, but the fact that it had been actually hidden from plain sight piqued her interest. Also, she was getting rather bored with learning just fire and other mundane spells. This spell book was apparently about temporarily modifying one’s own body using air magic; something she had little knowledge of, but felt she could learn by trying out some of the spells in the book.

After reaching the top of the tower, she set down her bag that held a change of clothes (Just in case.), and her training magic wand/staff.

Looking down at her already ample chest, she wondered with slight mirth just how much bigger she could actually get. Picking up the book, she turned to the first page, and spied a warning written in bold red letters.

“DANGER:” she read aloud. “Overuse of the magic contained in this book is potentially dangerous toward surrounding property, and should be used with utmost caution . . . Also not intended for mortals under eighteen . . . May be habit forming . . . Feh! Such nonsense!” Jessica quickly flipped through several pages in the book, until she reached the first clearly listed spell; one that was needed before using the other spells in the book. “Hmmm . . . How should I test this?”
13433212211.title: Jessica’s New Spell

134332122112.content:
Seeing the Goddess statue, with its arms outstretched, Jessica suddenly got an idea. She always did feel the “Goddess” seemed to look a little ‘flat’ in certain places. Or at least smaller than Jessica herself.

Holding the book in one hand, and the wand in the other, Jessica began muttering the incantation; A strange light green aura appeared in the chamber, and a flash of light shot out from Jessica into the statue, causing the eyes to momentarily glow.

Wondering if anything actually happened, Jessica walked up to the statue, and poked the ‘Goddess’ in the chest a little. Not exactly “Rubber”, but she noted that it kind of felt like a skin made of sand. Regardless, the spell had apparently worked on the statue.

“Now, what should we try first?” said Jessica, pacing in front of the Goddess statue, a slightly mischievous smile on her face.

There was a faint noise, like tinkling wind chimes, but there did not seem to be anything happening at first.

Upon closer inspection however, she did see what she first thought was “breathing” coming from the Goddess statue. The statue’s breasts were trying to grow, but it seemed as if it was going to be a slower process than she had anticipated.

Rather like a new balloon that had not been stretched, the pressure of the inflation spell she had cast needed to push out enough on the rubberized stone of the statue’s skin rather hard, before it could inflate. Now it makes sense that something made out of stone, even if a bit stretchy now thanks to the previous magic, would be difficult to inflate at first.

Jessica’s spell, as it went into the Goddess once more, did have the immediate desired effect that she intended . . . But she was rather unprepared for the VERY sudden, near explosive growth that the statue’s bust suddenly had.

15112112.content:
Felicia skipped into the hotel room with a medium-sized cardboard box in her arms, giggling happily about the fun she was going to have. Every so often she loved being able to take a break from her show-biz career, to have some rambunctious fun by herself. Her tail twitched with anticipation, as she entered her rather large hotel room.

As she carefully shut to door behind her, she used one of her claws to cut open the tape on the box she was carrying. Inside were four brand new, uninflated red rubber balls. She knew by the end of the night however, they would be little more than pretty rubber scraps all about the hotel room; a certain end for them, as she always popped her inflatable toys while playing with them. While she knew it was kind of a waste, the fun she would have popping them would make up for any regret she might have about it.

She opened up the closet door, and found the air tank she had requested. Upon closer inspection though, she noticed that it was actually a helium tank, which was not quite what she had ordered.

"Oh well." Thought Felicia to herself, as she pulled the tank over to the middle of the room. "I'll just use the left-over helium to make funny voices!"

She was sifting through the box to pull out her first toy for the night, when she found herself gripping a piece of paper instead. It read, "Warning: Do not over inflate bouncy-balls. Keep away from sharp objects. Failure to do so may result in bouncy-ball bursting, which may in turn lead to-"

Felicia tossed the warning over her shoulder, with a huff. "Bursting is the best part!"

She took the hose that was connected to the helium tank, and plugged the nozzle into one of the balls. With a twist of the valve, the pretty red ball sprang to life, enticing a delighted "Meow!" from the cat-girl. The tank quickly filled up the ball, bringing it to about twenty inches, before she slowed down the flow of helium into the ball.

"Wow! It looks like it can get pretty big." Thought Felicia. "I wonder, how big it can get . . .?"

With a twist of the valve, the ball began inflating even faster than before. It got up to twenty five inches in diameter, and eventually even thirty.

"Should I burst it like this, or play with it a little?" thought Felicia.
15112112.title: Having A Ball

The ball decided for her, at a little over forty inches.

BOOM!!!

Although Felicia was delighted about the wonderful explosion the beautiful ball made, she was a little surprised about the cloud of dust that it released when it burst. The light-pink dust engulfed her completely, but it did not seem to hamper her breathing. In fact, she seemed to be able to breath it quite easily; it smelled a bit like fresh balloons and flowers.

However, the rest of her body was beginning to feel a little ... odd. Not a bad sort of feeling, but more like her skin was being stretched a little. She began to get a little worried that her skin might be having an allergic reaction to the dust, and began to look for a way to get it off of her skin.

Even her fur seemed a little stretchy. She grabbed her tail, and found that it looked & felt kind of like a fuzzy twisty-balloon.

"Am . . . am I dreaming?!" Felicia remembered the warning notice, and picked it up off of the floor. She carefully read it this time.

"-bursting, which may in turn lead it the mass release of the special rubber-powder inside of these new model balls. The rubber-powder is inside of the balls to repair minor punctures and leaks that may occur with regular use of the bouncy-ball. This powder is non-toxic, but has been known to cause slight rubberizing of human and animal skin. Do not under any circumstances inhale the special rubber-powder, or full rubberizing of the body may occur. The full health complications of this are unknown. Please contact our help-line at 1-800-54 ..."

Felicia quickly dialed the number on the room phone, but the help service line was apparently very busy. After being on hold for three hours, and asked if she "had been helped yet" twice, she finally gave up, and sat on the bed next to the burst ball, and the three remaining ones.

"So, I guess I'm rubber now." Felicia gently poked at her breast, which bounced slightly. "At least I don't look too different from before. This would be kinda hard to explain." She continued to think for a few moments, and found her gaze falling on the helium tank, still sitting nearby. "I wonder ..."

She picked up the hose, and twisted on the tank, so a gentle stream blew through the nozzle.

"Let's see ..."

info.brief_description: Our favorite girls from Anime, games, and cartoons meet the explosive side of inflation.
info.description:
Note: This is based on of a story that was on Writing.com a few years ago. I do not recall the name or author of the story, but I liked the idea and enjoyed what chapters were written before it was taken down. Should the author come across this, I would like him/her to know that this is done out of respect for him/her and a method of thanking him/her for providing a basis for a great interactive story.

Choose your favorite female from your favorite game, anime, or cartoon and inflate her...however, in this story, our inflatees don't get the luxury of deflation. Bursting is the name of the game, whether from over-inflation, puncture, combustion, etc. Both heroines and villanesses can be used and the rules are as follows; no gore, no blood, tame explosions only (think of a balloon bursting), no orgies (this is an adult story, but don't go overboard), inflations are by gas and liquid only, and please use proper spelling and grammar...and as always, have FUN!

One last thing; while not required, I ask that, for heroine burstings, try to have them go happy. Save the bad burstings for the bad girls.
